channel.title: Black Mesa wallpapers
channel.description:
Hello guys and ladies,
my name is Paul, I'm from Poland. I'm graphic designer for 8 years, and I run small design studio here.
After hours I love to make some works in Photoshop. When I was younger I used to play Half Life alot. When I've completed game and all add-ons for it, I realized it was/it still is, one of the best game I've ever played. Maybe graphics is not so fresh any more, but plot just kick ass IMHO.
Yesterday when I was checking games news, I read that couple of fans created remake of this awesome game, on source engine. I've downloaded it of course, it was surprise for me that Black Mesa is a free game! I was even ready to pay for it if it's necessary...
Game of course [b]is freakin' awesome![/b] Because, as I wrote above, I'm graphic designer, I've decided to make something for You aswell. And of course for free.
Here, I've designed some wallpapers, for PC's (16:9), Android devices or iPhones. Fell free to use it. If somebody can send me cool screenshots from game or original font/logo, I will make more of them. You can send me them via email: [b]pmikolajek@pmtek.pl[/b]
thanks, keep doing great job guys. :slight_smile: I really appreciate this kind of initiative.
[url=https://iv.pl/images/54177873754738170530.jpg][img]https://www.iv.pl/images/04801402171032136965.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://iv.pl/images/73113901698626662911.jpg][img]https://www.iv.pl/images/56415825870911703733.jpg[/img][/url]
[img]https://www.iv.pl/images/26406675481625811368.jpg[/img]

item.title: Black Mesa wallpapers
item.dc:creator: rejnold
item.description:
Hello guys and ladies,

my name is Paul, I’m from Poland.
I’m graphic designer for 8 years, and I run small design studio here.

After hours I love to make some works in Photoshop.
When I was younger I used to play Half Life alot. When I’ve completed game and all add-ons for it, I realized it was/it still is, one of the best game I’ve ever played. Maybe graphics is not so fresh any more, but plot just kick ass IMHO.

Yesterday when I was checking games news, I read that couple of fans created remake of this awesome game, on source engine. I’ve downloaded it of course, it was surprise for me that Black Mesa is a free game! I was even ready to pay for it if it’s necessary…

Game of course is freakin’ awesome! Because, as I wrote above, I’m graphic designer, I’ve decided to make something for You aswell. And of course for free.

Here, I’ve designed some wallpapers, for PC’s (16:9), Android devices or iPhones. Fell free to use it. If somebody can send me cool screenshots from game or original font/logo, I will make more of them. You can send me them via email: pmikolajek@pmtek.pl

thanks,
keep doing great job guys.
I really appreciate this kind of initiative.
